organization.fullName: Cliniques universitaires Saint-Luc- Université Catholique de Louvain

identificationModule.briefTitle: Effect of Rehabilitation of Patients With a Central Nervous System Lesion

leadSponsor.name: Cliniques universitaires Saint-Luc- Université Catholique de Louvain

collaborators.name: Fonds pour la recherche scientifique médicale (FRSM), Belgium
Association nationale d'aide aux personnes handicapées (ANAH)

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The purpose of the study is to analyse the prehensions deficits and the effect of prehension rehabilitation in central nervous system lesioned people

armGroups.label: rehabilitation
armGroups.description: Bilateral and unilateral prehension oriented rehabilitation to enhance prehension.

interventions.name: rehabilitation
interventions.description: 4 weeks of bilateral followed or preceded by 4 weeks of unilateral similar prehension oriented repeated rehabilitation tasks. About 45 minutes 3 times a week, the subject is coached by a physiotherapist to enhance his prehension habilities.

primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: 4 weeks before, just before, after first part and after the second part of rehabilitation

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult minimum 6mounth after first stroke
* Minimal prehension of both hands

Exclusion Criteria:

* Diabetuss
* Other Upper Limb pathologies
* MMSE \< 26

overallOfficials.name: Delphine Dispa, PhD student
overallOfficials.affiliation: Rehabilitation and physical medecine Unit - UCL

locations.facility: READ : Rehabilitation and physical medecine Unit
